text: Unibuke (yewe Muhamadi) umuvandimwe w’aba Adi (Intumwa Hudu) ubwo yaburiraga abantu be bari batuye ahitwa Ah’qaf -kandi mbere ye na nyuma ye haje ababurizi- avuga ati “Ntimukagire undi mugaragira utari Allah. Mu by’ukuri ndatinya ko muzabona ibihano byo ku munsi uhambaye (nimukomeza guhakana).”
